doc.name: escapeKey
doc.summary: Sent when the user presses the Escape key.

examples.example:
on escapeKey -- return to the last card visited
go recent card
end escapeKey

description.p: Handle the escapeKey message if you want to perform some action when the user presses Escape.
The message is sent to the active (focused) control, or to the current card if no control is focused.
